rules_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Bless. [i](Create a colorless Blessing aura enchantment token attached to a nonland permanent with “Enchant nonland permanent” and “As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
• Populate. [i](Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]
• Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
